text: A Place in the World () is a 1992 Argentine Chilean Spanish Uruguayan movie directed by Adolfo Aristarain and stars José Sacristán, Federico Luppi, Leonor Benedetto, Cecilia Roth, Rodolfo Ranni. It was distributed by Transmundo Films. ==Other websites== * * Category:1992 drama movies Category:Argentine drama movies Category:Chilean movies Category:Spanish drama movies Category:Uruguayan movies
title: A Place in the World
